oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Integrability Conditions for SDEs and Semi-Linear SPDEs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wang, Feng-Yu
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Probability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: By using the local dimension-free Harnack inequality established on incomplete Riemannian manifolds, integrability conditions on the coefficients are presented for SDEs to imply the non-explosion of solutions as well as the existence, uniqueness and regularity estimates of invariant probability measures. These conditions include a class of drifts unbounded on compact domains such that the usual Lyapunov conditions can not be verified. The main results are extended to second order differential operators on Hilbert spaces and semi-linear SPDEs.
